Lobiel:
Indeed. Sayune was one of a kind. He left very specific instructions for his death, as well. Saia collected his soul, but his body was left to the Giants so that they could absorb fragments of it, and learn the skill of flight.
The remaining fragments were used by Spicula to create a kind of... floating land. That land is what most people mean when they say 'Sayune' today. Only those who have received the power of the giants and Awoken are able to travel on it.
